Package controller

Class Login

java.lang.Object
controller.Login
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class Login extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller class for handling login-related actions. The Login class manages the user interface and logic for the login screen. It allows users to enter their username and password, validates the provided credentials, and handles successful and unsuccessful login attempts. It also displays login attempts and their results to a log file.
Author:
Daniel Akoko

  • Method Details

    • cancelButtonAction

      public void cancelButtonAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Handles the action when "Cancel" button is clicked. Closes the login window.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The event triggering the action.

    • loginButtonAction

      public void loginButtonAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws Exception
      Handles the action when "Login" button is clicked. Performs login checks and processes: Validates username and password fields for emptiness and validity. Logs attempts and indicates success or otherwise. Displays error messages for invalid or empty fields. Navigates to the main screen on successful login and checks for upcoming appointments. Shows alerts for successful login with upcoming appointments or no upcoming appointments.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The event triggering the action.
      Throws:
      Exception - If there is an exception.

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Initializes the controller. Determines the user's location (zone ID) and displays it on the login form. Sets UI labels and buttons based on the current language using a resource bundle.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - The location used to resolve relative paths for the root object.
      resourceBundle - The resources used to localize the root object.

    • showAppointmentAlert

      private void showAppointmentAlert(Appointment appointment)
      Displays an alert with information about an upcoming appointment.
      Parameters:
      appointment - The appointment to display in the alert.

    • loginAttempt

      public void loginAttempt(String username, LocalDateTime timestamp, boolean success)
      Records a login attempt. Creates a log entry for the login attempt with username, timestamp, and success status. Appends the log entry to a dedicated file. Lambda Expression 2
      Parameters:
      username - The username used for the login attempt.
      timestamp - The timestamp of the login attempt.
      success - Indicates whether the login attempt was successful.
